data.text: @The_Jenius Aloha Jennifer, we apologize for the inconvenience this has caused. We'd be happy to assist you with filing a formal complaint through our Consumer Affairs Office if you'd like. Please send us a DM with your full name, confirmation code and email address for us to do so. Mahalo.

data.text:
#TravelPono: Appreciate the slower pace (and speed limits) in Hawai‘i. Here's how you can drive with aloha:
🚗 Lay off the car horn. 
🚗 Wave or shaka to thank other drivers.
🚗 Keep an eye out for keiki (children). 
🚗 Park in legal spaces & leave access for emergency vehicles. https://t.co/ytgz7pANjA

data.text: We have been called to duty under the Civil Reserve Air Fleet to support the emergency evacuation of Kabul, Afghanistan. We are proud to join the U.S. DoD & our fellow air carriers in the humanitarian effort to bring to the U.S. our citizens & the Afghans who supported them. https://t.co/J5sLvZf75U

data.text: @tamtamaccount5 We understand your concern, Thomas, and we apologize for the frustrating cancelation. Due to the restrictions in place (by the State of Hawai‘i), we will be operating an extremely limited schedule. We've already offered all possible options we have, per our travel waiver. Mahalo.

data.text: @tamtamaccount5 We're sorry that we didn't meet your expectations, Thomas. Since you booked Main Cabin Basic tickets, which is a highly restrictive type of fare, we can assist you change your flight, but it must be on the same compartment and journey origin and destination. Mahalo.
